Articles.Content: I had an unplanned reentry and as I was coming down I noticed something, so I set up a mapsat mission to look for anomalies and sent out a mission to land at that spot. Found a bunch of pyramid's there. Wondering if this is new to .20 or I just missed it before. Couldn't find anything searching.
You missed it before. This anomaly has been in the game for a few updates, since the terrain overhaul back in 0.18, there wasn't a desert before then.
Oh haha, my bad. Thanks. Has there been any new easter eggs found?
There's at least one more new easter egg on Kerbin from the 0.18 update, far different location though.

There's at least one more new easter egg on Kerbin from the 0.18 update, far different location though.

Any hints you can give us?
I would, but where you are searching now is very COLD
There are a bunch of objects all over the solar system. The best way to find them is to download the ISA MapSat mod. It's a bit broken for 0.20 though, so I suggest you wait for the update.
I have actually used the current dev build of mapsat for .20 to fully map Kerbin, Duna, Ike, and Dres with relatively zero issues. And the new layout is very favorable.
strange, I had visited those pyramids before, but didnt saw them orbiting kerbin on 0.2

strange, I had visited those pyramids before, but didnt saw them orbiting kerbin on 0.2

I have the same "problem", the flickering pixel is gone
